description: Delete an incident unit of measure quantity
permissions: User must be authorized to create the related incident per IncidentPolicy (or be an admin), as IncidentUnitOfMeasureQuantity permissions defer to the incident policy.
side_effects: Deletes an incident unit of measure quantity and touches the associated tender_job_schedule_shift and job_production_plan after commit.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. --confirm is required to proceed.
